about_the_game:
Survivor Alliance is a survivor like game that combines zombie and pigeon elements, where players take on the role of a human survivor fighting against zombies in a world dominated by zombies. Upgrade by killing zombies and selecting appropriate skills and items to survive.


The virus has spread globally, but humanity is far from giving up. Face your fear, transform into a warrior guarding humanity, and repel the zombies.


Upgrade battles, strengthen your weapons, change their form, and defeat zombies with more powerful weapons.


During the game, you will encounter supplies from the base, with some powerful items randomly appearing inside. Some can enhance your firearms and weapons, while others can improve your survival ability. Choosing them wisely is the key to becoming stronger.


During the battle, if you encounter different survivors, you can invite them to join the team or send them back to the safe zone to receive rewards. Build teams with different styles according to your preferences.


Build your favorite team through permanent upgrades. Determine your upgrade direction, pursue your favorite profession, and upgrade accordingly to become the guardian of the world.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and gore throughout the game

The virus has spread globally, but humanity is far from giving up. Face your fear, transform into a warrior guarding humanity, and repel the zombies.


Upgrade battles, strengthen your weapons, change their form, and defeat zombies with more powerful weapons.


During the game, you will encounter supplies from the base, with some powerful items randomly appearing inside. Some can enhance your firearms and weapons, while others can improve your survival ability. Choosing them wisely is the key to becoming stronger.


During the battle, if you encounter different survivors, you can invite them to join the team or send them back to the safe zone to receive rewards. Build teams with different styles according to your preferences.


Build your favorite team through permanent upgrades. Determine your upgrade direction, pursue your favorite profession, and upgrade accordingly to become the guardian of the world.
name: Survivor Alliance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5-4670K @ 3.40GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970 or better
  • Storage: 543 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 @ 3.60 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2060 or better
  • Storage: 543 MB available space

short_description: Go hunt zombies! Survivor Alliance is a survivor like game that combines zombie and pigeon elements, strengthening oneself through repeated choices and constantly improving in a world full of crises. Use strategies and operations to fight until the last moment.
